title: Aerosol and Dust aerosol optical property profiles_Dust mass concentration profiles_cloud-relevant dust number concentrations profiles_Global_CALIPSO
description: Aerosol (and dust aerosol) optical property profiles (extinction and backscatter coefficients, particle depolarization ratio) at 532 nm. Dust mass concentration and cloud-relevant dust number concentration profiles (based on Marinou et al. ACP (2017), Marinou et al. ACP (2019) and Ansmann et al., AMT (2019)). The products are provided for all CALIPSO overpasses, with horizontal resolution: 1x1 degree.
osc:project: Lidar Climatology of Vertical Aerosol Structure for Space-Based Lidar Simulation Studies-LIVAS
